text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: All alone, deep in the mountains, there lived a little witch.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
She had trouble finding a use for her magic. "Why do I have these 
powers?" she wondered.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
One night, she opened a picture book about the outside world and 
read it by the moonlight.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Within its pages lay a whole wide world, where many people lived in 
happiness.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "They're having so much fun. I want to go there too."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch's little heart fluttered with excitement. She longed to see 
the world outside.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
She began to think that if she used her magic, maybe she could make 
it into an even happier place.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Night came to an end, and the morning sun rose to shine down on the 
outside world.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch made a wish to bring happiness to all, and took a step 
toward the world outside.

A few days after Mejiro McQueen wins her second consecutive spring 
Tenno Sho…
Practice with Team Sirius is getting more and more heated.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yes! Another personal best!

The energy on the track is palpable, as the racers push each other 
beyond their limits.
I've never seen a more focused team.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

And at the center of it all is McQueen, with her majestic running on 
full display.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Damn, McQueen, I dunno how you do it. Practically ran a marathon, 
but your pace and form are still impeccable.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I bet there's not an Umamusume alive who could beat her in a 
long-distance race.

She's not wrong. You'd be hard pressed to find a stayer who could go 
toe-to-toe with McQueen.
But a certain someone does catch my eye…
But a certain someone does catch my eye…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

Rice Shower, our newest member. Unable to perform well and 
stressed out because of it, she joined us in rough shape.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hoo boy, Rice is all outta juice. Just look at that chin tilting up.

Truth is, she can't compare to McQueen. Not yet at least. But what I 
see is…

Truth is, she can't compare to McQueen. Not yet at least. But what I 
see is…
A deadly gaze fixed on the target running in front of her.
I see a fighting spirit not even the harshest headwind can snuff out.
And more than anything…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No… not yet… Come on, almost there…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Didn't expect her to stay on my tail quite this long. But no matter.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Ah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huff… puff…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And she does it again! Look at you, setting record times left and right!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wow! Just, wow!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
That's our Tenno Sho champion! That's our ace! Isn't that right, 
Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: P-please, there's no need for such flattery.
Solid running from Rice, too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… Wait, m-me?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You looked about ready to pass out, but you hung on till the end.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But… if my running really is "solid," then why can I never win a race?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
In the Satsuki Sho, and in my last race too, I tried so hard only to end 
up in eighth.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Yeah but c'mon, you had McQueen right in front of you until those 
last fifty meters. That's impressive.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But… I don't know…
What you need is confidence. The first step is convincing yourself that you can run.
What you need is confidence. The first step is convincing yourself that you can run.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And, after running alongside you, I can say with confidence that there 
is one other thing you require.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I am referring to distance.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: D-distance?
That's right. With your short and slender frame, plus those legs…
You're a natural stayer, no question about it.
You're a natural stayer, no question about it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm a stayer? The same as McQueen…

Yep. A longer distance will bring out your potential. Something 
longer than your previous races, at least.
Actually, there's a 2,400-meter coming up. Though the competition might be a bit… well, it will be tough.
Actually, there's a 2,400-meter coming up. Though the competition might be a bit… well, it will be tough.
Expressions grow serious as the others realize what I'm getting at.

The race is a special one for any runner. A once-in-a-lifetime chance 
to stand at the top.
choice_data_list: Your next stop will be the Japanese Derby!
Your next stop will be the Japanese Derby!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Th-the Derby?!

Her cry of disbelief lingers in the air. But despite how she may be 
feeling about her future right now, it's looking bright and sunny to 
me.
